alert.note: Alert for Bee; Duval; La Salle; Live Oak; McMullen; Webb (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 05 at 5:45PM CDT by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Duval, northeastern Webb, eastern La Salle, McMullen, northwestern Live Oak and northwestern Bee Counties through 615 PM CDT... At 545 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Cross to 9 miles south of Fort Ewell Site. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Freer, Three Rivers, Tilden, Choke Canyon, Seven Sisters, Loma Alta, Cross, Fowlerton, Fort Ewell Site, Calliham, Zella, Crowther, Los Angeles, Simmons, Whitsett and Esseville. This includes the following highways... Interstate 37 between mile markers 70 and 83. US Highway 281 between mile markers 618 and 622. US Highway 59 between mile markers 758 and 774. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Bee; Duval; La Salle; Live Oak; McMullen; Webb
